Author: ghoultearzz
Text: i have mixed answers too. all my lip piercings with my ed have been fine, no problems. years ago i used to have my cheeks pierced and my ed fucked with them as you can imagine they were always sore and inflamed so i took them out. my septum was fine. & my belly is fucked now bcs that's where i ball up my fist on my stomache to purge /:

Author: DogTeeth_Val
Text: I'm heavily pierced all over and got a majority of them done during low points with my ED.  I had a nose ring at one point. When I purged vomit would fly through my nose. The piercing would *BURN* so bad. I hated it so much that I ended up just taking it out and letting it heal over.  I remember researching ED forums for other people's experiences with how a piercing heals if you're in our position. A lot of mixed answers- some say their piercings healed fine, others say their piercings were absolutely fucked.
